alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 7:58PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong area of winds will impact portions of southwestern Otero, southeastern Luna, southern Dona Ana and El Paso Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 756 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong area of winds west of Santa Teresa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, East El Paso, Central El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Chaparral, Clint, Horizon City, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Vado, Sunland Park, Akela, Canutillo, Afton, San Elizario, Anthony Gap, Berino and Vinton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 100 and 122, and between mile markers 155 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 44. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
